Class MagazineService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ict373_assignment2.MagazineService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CookingSupplement, SportsSupplement, TechnologySupplement, TravelingSupplement

    public class MagazineService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    MagazineService class that handles data creation, management, and storage for each magazine service. 07/06/2022
    See Also:
